author: wn.com
title: The business of radio addressed at Leeds Beckett public lecture (Leeds Metropolitan University)
text: ( Source : Leeds Metropolitan University ) The power and the potential of radio, both as a broadcasting tool and career prospect, will be explored in a public talk organised by Leeds Beckett University . Part of the Leeds Business School Guest
